title: Moises
jd: [Moises.ai](https://moises.ai/it/) is looking for motivated PhD students for summer internships. Please send your application (CV, research goal, expertise, ...) to igor@moises.ai. or through the ISMIR [form](https://forms.gle/54jzCjuEMDQH8Mrv7).

title: Deezer
jd:
Internship will be announced soon!
Check our [Careers Page](https://www.deezerjobs.com/en) and upload your CV through the ISMIR [form](https://forms.gle/54jzCjuEMDQH8Mrv7).

title: Adobe

title: Steinberg Media Technologies GmbH
jd: To apply at Steinberg, please send an email to jobs@steinberg.de with your CV and Cover Letter.
